title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 1
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

1. Primož Roglič
2. Alex Aranburu +0:06
3. Jan Tratnik +0:08
4. Tom Scully +0:10
5. Josef Černý +0:10
6. Dylan Van Baarle +0:11
7. Andrea Bagioli +0:12
8. Lawson Craddock +0:13
9. Michael Matthews +0:14
10. Aleksandr Vlasov +0:14

La Vuelta a Espana 2021: Route, Predictions and Contenders

Points Classification

1. Primož Roglič - 20 points
2. Alex Aranburu - 17 points
3. Jan Tratnik - 15 points
4. Tom Scully - 13 points
5. Josef Černý - 11 points

La Vuelta stage 2 preview

King of the Mountains Classification

1. Sepp Kuss - 3 points
2. Sep Vanmarcke - 2 points
3. Rui Oliveira - 1 points

Young Rider's Classification

1. Andrea Bagioli
2. Aleksandr Vlasov + 0:02
3. Clément Champoussin +0:08
4. Pavel Sivakov +0:10
5. Gino Mäder +0:11

Team Classification

1. Team Jumbo Visma 
2. Astana-Premier Tech +0:06
3. Deceuninck–Quick-Step +0:10
4. EF Education-Nippo +0:11
5. Bahrain Victorious +0:13

Cover image: Justin Setterfield/Getty Images
author: Peter Stuart
